title: video2brain - Getting Started with Joomla!
description: The content management system Joomla! makes it easy for web developers and non-developers alike to create and, more importantly, maintain their own websites. In this workshop, trainer and consultant Laura Gordon teaches you everything you need to know to build a site with Joomla!, from installing the software, to adding and editing content, to working with components, modules, menus, and templates.
